snippet.title: 2020 Social Commentary, from... 2008? | Let's Play :the game: | Graeme Games (Flash classic)
snippet.description:
Let's play :the game:
What a strange sentence to write? I guess writing out this entire description is going to feel like that, eh?

Welcome to :THE GAME: from nutcasenightmare (Nicky Case), the Flash classic, where a 13 year old made more meaningful social commentary that most late night talk show hosts! Seriously. This game is so packed full of jokes, references, riffs, parodies, and more - that it's hard to even keep track of!

Play the game yourself ► https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/467574

Nicky's own description of the game:
"With over 40 levels, over 60 characters, over 3 minutes worth of cutscenes, over 2 months of development, over 9000 jokes, over $153 spent on coffee, and over 6 statistics made up, you'd think I'd have a better title."

------------------

2LT LINKS:
Patreon ► https://www.patreon.com/2LeftThumbs
Discord ► https://discord.gg/T2DR5d7
Twitch ► https://www.twitch.tv/2_left_thumbs
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/2_left_thumbs
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/pages/2-Left-Thumbs/862024637202200
Official site ► http://2leftthumbs.com

Intro music by Alec Shea ► http://www.alecshea.com/
